titles.title: Supporting raising awareness and educating the public about upper limb and lower limb differences.
Supporting raising awareness and educating the public about upper limb and lower limb differences.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Supports the designation of National Upper and Lower Limb Differences Month and Wear Orange Day. (Limb differences are medical conditions that result in limbs that are unequal in length.)
